description: A structure that contains information about your directory registration.

parameters.name: DirectoryRegistrationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.

nested_items.name: DirectoryRegistration
nested_items.description: The directory registration represents the authorization of the connector service with a directory.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the directory registration was created.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Active Directory.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Additional information about the directory registration status if the status is failed.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the directory registration was updated.
